channel.title: 1.7.7.x on PrestaShop Developers' blog
channel.description: Recent content in 1.7.7.x on PrestaShop Developers' blog

item.title: Release of PrestaShop 1.7.7.8
item.description: PrestaShop 1.7.7.8 is now available. This maintenance release fixes 1 major regression.

item.title: Release of PrestaShop 1.7.7.7
item.description: PrestaShop 1.7.7.7 is now available. This maintenance release fixes 1 critical regression and 1 minor regression.

item.title: Release of PrestaShop 1.7.7.6
item.description: PrestaShop 1.7.7.6 is now available. This maintenance release fixes 31 regressions reported since the 1.7.7.0, including 2 critical regressions.

item.title: Release of PrestaShop 1.7.7.5
item.description: PrestaShop 1.7.7.5 is now available. This maintenance release fixes 19 regressions reported since the 1.7.7.0.

item.title: Release of PrestaShop 1.7.7.4
item.description: PrestaShop 1.7.7.4 is now available. This maintenance release fixes 13 issues reported since the 1.7.7.0.

item.title: Release of PrestaShop 1.7.7.3
item.description: PrestaShop 1.7.7.3 is now available. This maintenance release fixes 10 bugs reported on previous 1.7.7 versions, as well as one security issue.

item.title: Release of PrestaShop 1.7.7.2
item.description: After a few weeks dedicated to fixing upgrades problems, regressions and security issues found on the previous 1.7.7 versions, PrestaShop 1.7.7.2 is finally available!

item.title: Release of PrestaShop 1.7.7.1
item.description: PrestaShop 1.7.7.1 is now available. This maintenance release fixes 41 regressions reported on version 1.7.7.0.

item.title: PrestaShop 1.7.7.0 is available
item.description: We are happy to announce PrestaShop 1.7.7.0 is officially available!

item.title: PrestaShop 1.7.7.0 RC1 Is Ready To Be Tested!
item.description: We are really happy to announce that we are very close to finishing the 1.7.7.0 release, the release candidate is the last step before the final version is out.

item.title: PrestaShop 1.7.7.0 Beta 2 Is Ready To Be Tested!
item.description: The second Beta version for PrestaShop 1.7.7.0 is now ready for you to test!

item.title: PrestaShop 1.7.7.0 Beta Is Ready To Be Tested!
item.description: The first Beta version for PrestaShop 1.7.7.0 is now ready for you to test!

item.title: Introduction to the fuzzy search
item.description: It is always great to see contributions from our community merged, it reminds the power of working on an open-source project. Especially when there are great features at stake, like the fuzzy search.
